pull.title: Build Windows version with msys2 build
pull.body:
* update steps for build Bitcoin Core with msys2
* fix test/util/rpcauth-test.py and test/util/test_runner.py  to run in msys2
* added test/util/path_helper.py to handle msys2 paths in python

events.message: * added test/util/path_helper.py to handle msys2 paths in python

* update doc/build-windows.md
* fix W292 no newline at the end of file
Merge branch 'windows-msys2-build' of https://github.com/rnapoles/bitcoin into windows-msys2-build

events.body:

You should have a clean commit history with focused commits and clear titles+descriptions
Why was this closed and a new PR opened (#24985) ?

My apologies, I'm new in this, I had made some mistakes with the previous
pull and I couldn't find a way to correct them.
